questions.subject: Physics

question_value.text: A ball is thrown vertically upwards with a velocity of 10 m/s. What is the maximum height reached by the ball?

questions.solution: Using the formula h = v² / (2g), where g = 10 m/s², we find h = 10² / (2*10) = 5 m.

question_value.text: Find the derivative of the function f(x) = x² + 5x + 6.
